TextBlock.Text: DEUTZIA: <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>'s cloaking field is finished! My work on this star is almost done.
DEUTZIA: The beautiful stars can now be viewed even during the day.
DEUTZIA: All that's left to do is to make sure <color=orange>Hidden Light</color> can detect <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>...
DEUTZIA: Yes! It works! <color=orange>Hidden Light</color> is expanding!
DEUTZIA: This will surely be enough solar energy to power <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>.
